Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora to sharpish turn. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 28a, 2 Name Xenophanes. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 084.28.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0868)
